motion.title: Broken link in the Citation section
motion.description:
There's no target for the link in the [Citation](https://github.com/pluralitybook/plurality/blob/main/ReadMe.md#citation) section because `}` is appended to the link [https://github.com/pluralitybook/plurality/tree/main/contents/english](https://github.com/pluralitybook/plurality/tree/main/contents/english).
Putting the sample into a code wrapper would be an option to resolve the problem.
